verses.name: Psalms 135:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord. Praise ye the name of the Lord; praise him, O ye servants of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 135:2
verses.text: Ye that stand in the house of the Lord, in the courts of the house of our God,

verses.name: Psalms 135:3
verses.text: Praise the Lord; for the Lord is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.

verses.name: Psalms 135:4
verses.text: For the Lord hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.

verses.name: Psalms 135:5
verses.text: For I know that the Lord is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.

verses.name: Psalms 135:6
verses.text: Whatsoever the Lord pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.

verses.name: Psalms 135:7
verses.text: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.

verses.name: Psalms 135:8
verses.text: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.

verses.name: Psalms 135:9
verses.text: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

verses.name: Psalms 135:10
verses.text: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;

verses.name: Psalms 135:11
verses.text: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:

verses.name: Psalms 135:12
verses.text: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

verses.name: Psalms 135:13
verses.text: Thy name, O Lord, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O Lord, throughout all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 135:14
verses.text: For the Lord will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

verses.name: Psalms 135:15
verses.text: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

verses.name: Psalms 135:16
verses.text: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

verses.name: Psalms 135:17
verses.text: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

verses.name: Psalms 135:18
verses.text: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.

verses.name: Psalms 135:19
verses.text: Bless the Lord, O house of Israel: bless the Lord, O house of Aaron:

verses.name: Psalms 135:20
verses.text: Bless the Lord, O house of Levi: ye that fear the Lord, bless the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 135:21
verses.text: Blessed be the Lord out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the Lord.
